name: The Void Sandwich Shop
description:
Build the tallest sandwich with your mad finger skills and get promoted, or make them ingredients fly with your buttery fingers and watch the customer back away slowly. CHOOSE WISELY. 

Made in GameMaker Studio 2 for ShenaniJam 2018. 

Music downloaded from http://freemusicarchive.org under Creative Commons CC BY 3.0

Title Music: Kosmiche Slop by Anenon
Game Music: Steppin by Wake
